projects.name: Fashion Product Recommender System
projects.description: Built a fashion product recommender system using a ResNet architecture for feature extraction from a massive dataset of over 44,000 images. Executed a recommendation engine using KNN algorithms, recommending relevant fashion items to users based on their preferences.

projects.name: Emotion Detection
projects.description: Created an emotion detection system using RNN architecture (specifically LSTM) for efficient sequence processing in emotion detection. Trained on various machine learning algorithms (Logistic Regression, SVM, Random Forest, Naive Bayes) to analyze text and identify emotions behind sentences 85 accuracy.

projects.name: ASL Sign Language Detection
projects.description: Made a system to recognize hand signs of the English alphabet (A-Z) using MediaPipe and OpenCV Computer vision library for image processing and for hand landmark detection with 85 accuracy.

experiences.description: Developed and deployed a machine learning model to assess water quality in Rwandan rivers, achieving an accuracy of 85. Learned web scraping techniques using Beautiful Soup library, enhancing data acquisition capabilities for future projects.

Implemented a Convolution Neural Network (CNN) architecture for early forest fire detection, reducing simulated response time by 20. Gained expertise in image processing techniques, equipping me for tasks involving image analysis and manipulation.

Completed an internship in Python and Machine Learning, demonstrating proficiency in Python programming for data analysis and modeling tasks. Mastered fundamental machine learning algorithms, data visualization libraries (Seaborn, matplotlib), and numerical computing tools (NumPy, pandas, scikit-learn), gaining the technical foundation for a successful career in AI.

full_output.name: Alka Gupta
achievements_and_awards: Winner Innotech22 - KIET annual Technical Fest Nov 2022
